Nasdem : Fraksi Gerindra dan PPP Ingin RKUHP Langsung Disahkan
05 Nov 2019, 13:16 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Nasdem : Fraksi Gerindra dan PPP Ingin RKUHP Langsung Disahkan

KBRN, Jakarta : Perdebatan dalam pembahasan Rancangan Kitab Undang-undang Hukum Pidana (RKUHP) masih terus saja berlangsung. Pasalnya, ada fraksi yang ingin RKUHP langsung disahkan, ada pula fraksi yang masih ingin membahas beberapa pasal yang dinilai kontroversial.Anggota Komisi III DPR RI, Taufik Basari mengungkapkan, beberapa diantara fraksi yang ingin RKUHP langsung disahkan adalah Fraksi Partai Gerindra dan Fraksi Partai Persatuan Pembangunan (PPP)."Memang ada beberapa pendapat yang berbeda-beda dari fraksi yang ada di Komisi III. Seperti Gerindra, PPP, menginginkan agar tidak usah ada pembahasan kembali, langsung disahkan karena sudah melewati tahap I, sudah dinyatakan selesai dan bisa menyerahkannya ke tahap II," ungkapnya saat berbincang dengan Radio Republik Indonesia, Selasa (5/11/2019).Sedangkan, fraksi yang masih ingin melakukan pembahasan mendalam atas beberapa pasal-pasal kontroversial diantaranya adalah Fraksi Partai Nasdem dan dan Fraksi PKS."Fraksi seperti Nasdem dan PKS yang menginginkan sebelum disahkan, tetap dibuka kesempatan untuk pembahasan kembali. Coba cek mengenai keberatan yang ada, kontroversi yang ada, yang dipermasalahkan kemudian kita carikan solusinya," bebernya.Solusi yang ditawarkan, lanjut Taufik, bermacam-macam. Diantaranya adalah merubah rumusan, menghilangkan, ataupun memberikan penjelasan tambahan agar pasal-pasal kontroversial tersebut tidak serta-merta menjadi pasal karet."Bentuknya bisa macam-macam hasil dari pembahasan tersebut. Tapi yang jelas kalau dari Fraksi Partai Nasdem, kita berharap tetap dibuka suatu pembahasan, agar tidak bermasalah di kemudian hari," tandasnya.Meski masih ada beberapa perdebatan, Taufik mengaku yakin kalau pembahasan RKUHP bakalan rampung pada bulan Desember tahun 2019 ini."Menurut saya harus mampu (rampung bulan Desember). Tinggal di ujungnya saja," pungkasnya.Â Beberapa waktu lalu, akibat tak setuju dengan beberapa pasal yang dianggap masih kontroversial, berbagai elemen dari mahasiswa, masyarakat dan pelajar melakukan aksi protes di hampir seluruh wilayah Indonesia. Beberapa diantara aksi demo tersebut bahkan berujung bentrok. (Foto : dpr.go.id)

Nasdem: Gerindra and PPP Faction Want RKUHP Immediately Ratified
05 Nov 2019, 13:16 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Nasdem: Gerindra and PPP Faction Want RKUHP Immediately Ratified

KBRN, Jakarta: Debate in discussing the Draft Criminal Code Book (RKUHP) is still ongoing. The reason is, there are factions that want RKUHP to be ratified immediately, there are also factions that still want to discuss some articles which are considered controversial. Members of the House of Representatives Commission III, Taufik Basari revealed, some of the factions that wanted RKUHP to be ratified immediately were Gerindra Party Faction and United Development Party Faction. (PPP). "Indeed there are a number of different opinions from the factions in Commission III. Like Gerindra, PPP, desires that there be no further discussion, it is immediately endorsed because it has passed stage I, has been declared complete and can submit it to the stage II, "he said while speaking with Radio Republik Indonesia, Tuesday (11/05/2019). Meanwhile, factions that still wanted to conduct in-depth discussions on several controversial articles include the Nasdem Party Faction and the PKS Faction." Faction like Nasdem and PKS, who wants it to be approved before, is still open for discussion. Try to check the objections "The existing controversy, which is at issue then we find a solution," he explained. Solutions offered, continued Taufik, were various. Among them is changing the formulation, eliminating, or providing additional explanations so that the controversial articles do not necessarily become rubber articles. "The form can be various kinds of results from the discussion. But what is clear is that from the Nasdem Party Faction, we hope to keep opening a discussion, so that there is no problem in the future, "he said. Even though there was still some debate, Taufik said he was confident that the RKUHP discussion would be completed in December 2019." In my opinion it should be able to (completed in December). Just stay at the end, " he concluded. Some time ago, as a result of disagreeing with several articles which were considered still controversial, various elements from students, the community and students protested in almost all regions of Indonesia. Some of the demonstrations even led to clashes. (Photo: dpr.go.id)
